screen.name: MessageBox1
screen.applet: from enigma import eSize, ePoint orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize() textsize = (textsize[0] + 100, textsize[1] + 100) offset = 20 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: offset = 100 wsizex = textsize[0] + 100 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset if (600 > wsizex): wsizex = 600 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey) self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize)) self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize)) listsize = (wsizex - 20, 70) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(10, textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize)) newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2, orgpos.y()))

widget.convert: {"templates": {"default": (60,[ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10, 0), size = (730, 32), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 0), # index 0 is the name MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10, 32), size = (750, 25), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # index 2 is the description MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (740, 10), size = (48, 48), png = 5), # index 5 is the status pixmap MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (0, 75), size = (0, 0), png = 6), # index 6 is the div pixmap ]), "category": (60,[ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10, 0), size = (800, 32), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 0), # index 0 is the name MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10, 32), size = (800, 25), font=2, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # index 1 is the description MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (0, 59), size = (0, 0), png = 3), # index 3 is the div pixmap ]) }, "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 28),gFont("Regular", 22),gFont("Regular", 22)], "itemHeight": 60 }

{"templates": {"default": (37, [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0, 0), size = (0, 0), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # key, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (5, 3), size = (30, 37), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # number, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (40, 3), size = (260, 37), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 3), # description, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (305, 3), size = (370, 37), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 4), # language, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (680, 3), size = (155, 37), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 5), # selection, ], True, "showNever"), "notselected": (25, [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0, 0), size = (0, 0), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # key, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (5, 3), size = (30, 37), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # number, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (40, 3), size = (260, 37), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 3), # description, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (305, 3), size = (370, 37), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 4), # language, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (680, 3), size = (155, 37), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 5), # selection, ], False, "showNever") }, "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 28), gFont("Regular", 28)], "itemHeight": 37 }
